availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Miller (Bath County, Kentucky, copper tin smith and jailor)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, copper tin smith and jailer. Kentucky native. Married to Missouri Hornback Miller. Father of Alberta Miller and Fannie Miller. Copper tin smith in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1860. Jailer in Bath County in August 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 7.
KYR-0002-060-0011.
